name: UE April Jam - EggHunt
description:
Near me there is an little park.

Good place for an easter egg hunt.

Step 1 - Measurement and Blockout

Step 2 - Add Foliage - Decided to use a pixel shader. Keep the focus on colors and shapes.

Step 3 - Materials - I used materials from pictures taken at the park.

In my previous Jam - "Freedom Simulator" I used photos of houses to surround the player. I took all new photos of the houses surrounding the park. This time focusing in on smaller architectural details and overall color.

Step 4 - Create logic for picking up eggs, create a "win" state.

Please leave a comment with thoughts and feedback!
